= Introduction =

There needs to be more example videos along with downloadable graphs, so I'll take some of mine and allow them to be used by anyone.


= Details =

*Basic Plasma*

This effect looks really awesome initally, and is very easy to create with a couple of mixers and a plasma block.

Feedback can be pretty compelling, but typically leads to periodicity- signal generators set to noize can avoid too much repetition but any effect looks samey after a while.
